patthana12.3:1.1: Nahetuṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.3:2.1: Nahetuṁ nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha pañca. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.3:3.1: Nahetuṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana12.3:4.1: Nahetuṁ naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana12.3:5.1: Nahetuṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.3:6.1: Nahetuṁ noāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.3:7.1: Nahetuṁ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha pañca. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.3:8.1: Nahetuṁ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.3:9.1: Nahetuṁ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha pañca. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.3:10.1: Nahetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava.)
